editions.name: Energy Drink
editions.flavor_description: Red Bull Energy Drink is appreciated worldwide by athletes, busy professionals, university students, and travelers on long journeys

editions.name: Energy Drink Sugarfree
editions.flavor_description: Wings without sugar: Red Bull Sugarfree is Red Bull Energy Drink without sugar

editions.name: Energy Drink Zero
editions.flavor_description: Zero calories. 100% Wings. Enjoy the taste of Red Bull Zero

editions.name: The Winter Edition
editions.flavor_description: Red Bull Winter Edition with a taste of apple and a spicy touch of Ginger

editions.name: The Yellow Edition
editions.flavor_description: Red Bull Yellow Edition. Prepare to be surprised by the exotic taste of Tropical Fruits

editions.name: The Purple Edition Sugarfree
editions.flavor_description: Experience the unique exotic taste of Acai. Red Bull Acai Edition Sugarfree
editions.alt_text: Red Bull Purple Edition Sugarfree - image

editions.name: The Red Edition
editions.flavor_description: Red Bull Red Edition with Watermelon taste

editions.name: The Apricot Edition
editions.flavor_description: Red Bull Apricot offers the perfect fusion between the tastes of Apricot and Strawberry with notes of Peach
